scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.test-python: FLASK_DEBUG=0 coverage run --source=. -m unittest discover webapp/tests
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p static/js && cp node_modules/@canonical/global-nav/dist/global-nav.js static/js/global-nav.js && cp node_modules/@canonical/global-nav/dist/global-nav.js.map static/js/global-nav.js.map
